Params: {3: 'The world turns into a dark red spider web.'}
{3: "Liquid, liquid, liquid. Strangely, your lungs don't resist."}
{3: 'You open your eyes, and the spider web clings to your eyeballs.'}
{3: 'A sharp pain shoots through your head, like an arthropod rampaging inside, desperately trying to break free.'}
{3: 'This empty space is chaotic; you need something to hold onto.'}
{3: "But your skin's just coated in some thick goo, so you can't tell where your flesh and bones end and the world begins."}
{3: 'What you see might just be nothing more than your last thoughts.'}
{3: 'Then, something weird happens in your head.'}
{3: 'The juice bursts in your mouth, all tangy and fresh.'}
{3: 'The tang hits your tongue, and suddenly you feel gravity again. Your drifting thoughts come crashing back down to the support beneath you—'}
{3: 'Vanessa pulls the dripping fruit away from your lips, then flicks her military knife in the air.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "I thought I'd have to bury you. Too bad.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You try to force your eyes open to get rid of the web.'}
{3: 'But it still stings, like tiny needles digging into your skin.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Passing out miles from the designated location and face-planting in a snowdrift—even if there was a sudden Mutated Red Tide attack...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'But after all this time, you still faint around Mutated Red Tide...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vanessa's knife moves smoothly as she peels another fruit, making a perfect spiral of skin."}
{3: 'A slice of fruit, on a dagger, is held to your lips.'}
{2: '(Open mouth and eat it)', 3: '54', 4: '(Take it off and eat it)', 5: '52'}
{3: 'The tang hits your mouth again, and the cold fruit wakes you up a bit.'}
{3: 'Seeing your face, Vanessa stops talking and offers another slice of fruit.'}
{2: 'I saw... the bottom of the ocean.', 3: '65'}
{3: 'The tide surges in with ferocious hunger—the touch of death presses against your skin with surreal intensity.'}
{3: "Scenes from the dream, and the depths you'd sunk into during unconsciousness..."}
{3: 'Fragments of half-real memories swirl and shift in your mind, refusing to settle.'}
{3: 'She stops peeling the fruit, looking confused.'}
{3: 'Torrential rain and waves crash against the coastal rocks, enveloping the fully armed squad in a thick blanket of mist.'}
{3: 'Red laser dots focus on the target, but the glowing object in their arms makes everyone hesitate to pull the trigger.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Gray Raven Commandant... do you remember that number?'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'You told me... another version of you.'}
{3: 'That person said, "I was the one left behind..."'}
{3: 'The one at the bottom of the ocean, "Gray Raven Commandant".'}
{3: 'Then, in a place where sunlight cannot reach, beside the mermaid, death comes.'}
{3: 'Before she finishes, urgent knocking tears through the heavy atmosphere.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Commandant... the Mutated Red Tide's moving in a new way!", 4: '1'}
